thread.title: Orbit: Houston’s Best Mascot
thread.title_full: Orbit: Houston’s Best Mascot | Houston Press

author: Houston Press
title: Orbit: Houston’s Best Mascot
text:
Marco Torres Want to know where the best dog park in town is? How about the best places to bike, jog, or have a picnic?
Well, you can check out our picks in the sports & recreation section of this year’s Best of Houston issue , which we published this week. You can see our choices for best dog park (Bill Archer Bark Park), Texan (J.J. Watt, duh…), and beach (East Beach).
Related Stories Astros Keep Playoff Hopes Alive With Win Over Rangers Astros vs. White Sox and Orbit’s Birthday And for best sports mascot, you know we got love for Orbit.
Maybe you’ll agree with us, maybe you won’t (but seriously, who doesn’t love Orbit?). Either way, you should read it online or in print this week and let us know what you think. And check out the readers’ choice categories to see what your fellow Houstonians voted for.
So go pick up a copy and congratulate our beloved alien friend for officially being the best mascot in this fine city (as far as we're concerned, at least).
And go ‘Stros.
Contact: Houston Press Follow: Houston Press Houston Press
